short.de: Automatisches Crossposting von X zu TruthSocial.
short.es: Auto-publicación cruzada de X a TruthSocial.
short.fr: Publication croisée automatique de X à TruthSocial.
short.pl: Automatyczne publikowanie z X na TruthSocial.
short.ru: Автоматическая публикация с X на TruthSocial.
short.uk: Автоматичне публікування з X на TruthSocial.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you want to post your original content on Truth Social, but you post primarily on X due to it's wide reach, now you can cross-post from X to Truth Social easily!

Once enabled, when you log in to Truth and X, when you create new posts on X, a similar post will be made directly to Truth automatically! Initial version supports media attachments and polls.
